summary: Phonetic/visual keyboard map for hebrew ISO-8859-8 chars
name: Redundant-phoneticvisual-Hebrew-keyboar
description: Phonetic/visual hebrew keyboard map, redundancy in that for example all 'o' 'u' and 'v' are mapped to hebrew 'vaf', and so on.
install_details:
better
:set noallowrevins
since we fake that in the script, then
:so <script.vim>
